name: Purple & Turquoise Scrap Fabric Shorts DIY Festival Gypsy Pixie OOAK Goth Punk Metal
description:
These shorts were made from scrap black tshirt fabric, with various pieces of purple and turquoise toned fabrics scraps top-stitched together over top (some of the black still peeks through here and there). Lots of time was spent sewing down all the pieces! Purple knit fabric was used for the waistband.
Black/white thread was used for all seams, with purple thread for top-stitching. Bottoms left with raw ends (I thought it looked best this way with scrap fabric look - if you'd like them serged just leave a note).

The use of the scrap fabrics in these shorts was inspired by Intergalactic Apparel's weaved fabric - check out their amazing clothing here on etsy!
www.intergalacticapparel.etsy.com

Size: S/M (see measurements below as sizes are not universal)

For reference, I am 34B, 5'3 (so pants will be much longer on me than most :P), and wear 3/5 pants (generally S/M sizing)

Seams are serged, and/or top stitched where necessary for durability!


NOTE on Measurements:
Front/Back rise and inseam measured from centre of crotch seam to top of waistband or bottom of pants, respectively.
Waist measurements are for the WAISTBAND (it may be sitting at your hips, not your waist, depending on the pants and where you fold the waistband over to if it's a foldover one - please keep this in mind when looking at measurements). Measurement are given from unstretched to where it will stretch to comfortably - taken lying flat and then doubled.


Approximate Measurements (sample measurements from the ones in the pics - stretchiness will vary depending on fabrics):
Waist: 28-34"
Front Rise: 7.25"
Back Rise: 10.25"
Inseam: 4"
Length: 10"


All shipments come with tracking.

name: Dark Purple and Black Corset Halter Top Zebra Scrap Fabric DIY Shirt OoAk
description:
This shirt was made from a stretchy purple/black zebra fabric for the front, along with some stud-and-o-ring trim down the middle. The back panels were made from scrap black tshirt fabric with lots of small scrap fabric pieces sewn down on top of it. I spent lots of time sewing everything down so that everything is secure. Black lace was used around the bottom and for the halter strap, and black organza elastic trim was used around the top. Corset detailing was added to the back with black ribbon (I left lots of extra ribbon so it can be adjusted to bigger sizes as well).
*the lighting is a bit off for the back piece in the pic on me - please see the pic of it lying down for accurate colours (the fabrics are deep purple, there is no blue tint to them)
Black thread was used for all seams, with black thread for all top stitching.

The use of the scrap fabrics in the back of this shirt was inspired by Intergalactic Apparel's weaved fabric - check out their amazing clothing !
www.intergalacticapparel.etsy.com

Size: Adjustable (read measurements below as sizes are not universal)
(pictured on a small or S/M)

Seams are serged, and/or top stitched where necessary for durability!

For reference, I am 34B, 5'3 (so pants will be much longer on me than most :P), and wear 3/5 pants (generally S/M sizing)


NOTE on Measurements:
All shirt measurements are lying flat, across the front, from unstretched to where it will stretch to at its max.


Approximate Measurements (taken on the front piece - back can be adjusted smaller or bigger with the ribbon)
Top: 14.5" (unstretched)
Middle: 12.5"
Bottom: 15"
Length: 16"

All shipments come with tracking.

name: Fairy Pixie Tattered Wrap Skirt Festival DIY Upcycled OOAK Blues
description:
This skirt was made from various scrap pieces of fabrics in blues, along with dark blue fabric for the waistband.

*NOTE: The skirt wraps around more than once on me, so alignment of fabrics may look different if it's wrapping around less/more on you.

Size: Adjustable - see below for details

For reference, I am 34B, 5'3 (so pants will be much longer on me than most :P), and wear 3/5 pants (generally S/M sizing)

All seams serged and/or top-stitched where necessary for durability. Black thread used for all seams; blue thread for top-stitching.


NOTE on Measurements:
Measurements are taken LYING FLAT.
Waist measurements are for the waistband UNSTRETCHED.


Approximate Measurements:
Waistband: 44" (not including ties); ties are 28-29" long each - tie to desired fit
Length: 13" (average; varies)



Skirt was washed after construction, prior to pics and measurements.

All shipments come with tracking.

'Like' my page on facebook for updates and sales!
www.facebook.com/trefoilclothing

name: Purple and Black Headphones Crossbones Pants DIY Womens Upcycled OoAK pixie festival yoga goth
description:
These comfy pants were made from a medium weight purple stretchy fabric for the main part (not sure what the material is, but it's one of the most comfortable fabrics I've found!), along with a black with silver headphones and crossbones knit fabric for side panels. Scrap black tshirt fabric was used for the foldover waistband (waistband pictured partially folded over). (The side panels will not stretch, but the main part of the pants will)
*Please note that I am short (these pants are quite long on me), so in the pics the pants will look bunched up at the bottom.

Black thread used for all seams. Ends left with serged seams (can be hemmed if needed).

Size: S/M

For reference, I am 34B, 5'3 (so pants will be much longer on me than most :P), and wear size 3 pants (generally S/M sizing)

Seams are serged, and/or top stitched where necessary for durability!


NOTE on Measurements:
Front/Back rise and inseam measured from centre of crotch seam to top of waistband or bottom of pants, respectively.
Waist measurements are for the waistband UNSTRETCHED to where it stretches to comfortably. Measurements are taken lying flat, and then double.

Note that the waistband may not actually sit at the waist - usually it's just above my hips.

Approximate Measurements:
Waist: 28-34" (top of foldover waistband); 26-32" (bottom of foldover waistband)
Front Rise: up to 12.5" (depending where waistband sits; foldover waistband is 5")
Back Rise: up to 14.5"
Inseam: 34.5"
Length: up to 44"

**leave a note to seller or convo me if you need it hemmed

Pants were washed after construction, prior to pics and measurements.

All shipments come with tracking.

'Like' me on facebook for updates and sales!
www.facebook.com/trefoilclothing

name: CUSTOM Scrap Fabric Pants Womens Gypsy Pants, Pixie Fashion, Yoga Wear, Festival Wear
description:
**This is a custom, made to order item. Please message BEFORE purchasing to discuss colour options - depending on what fabric colour you'd like for the main part, I may have to do some fabric hunting, as my fabric selection changes constantly. The pictures in this listing are there to show the style.**

These comfy pants were made from a (your choice) fabric for the main part, along with a (your choice) fabric for the foldover waistband (waistband pictured partially folded over). The side panels consist of several scrap pieces of various fabrics (your choice) all top stitched down onto a piece of (depending what's left for scrap fabric) fabric. Lots of time was spent sewing these pieces down!
*Please note that I am short (these pants are quite long on me), so in the pics the pants will look bunched up at the bottom.

The use of the scrap fabrics for the side panels was inspired by Intergalactic Apparel's weaved fabric - check out their amazing clothing !
www.intergalacticapparel.etsy.com

Black thread used for all seams; (your choice) for top stitching (underside of top-stitching was done to match underside). Ends left with serged seams (can be hemmed if needed).

Size: S/M

For reference, I am 34B, 5'3 (so pants will be much longer on me than most :P), and wear size 3 pants (generally S/M sizing)

Seams are serged, and/or top stitched where necessary for durability!


NOTE on Measurements:
Front/Back rise and inseam measured from centre of crotch seam to top of waistband or bottom of pants, respectively.
Waist measurements are for the waistband UNSTRETCHED to where it stretches to comfortably. Measurements are taken lying flat, and then double.

Note that the waistband may not actually sit at the waist - usually it's just above my hips.

Approximate Measurements - **these will vary depending on fabric - sample is for the purple pants in the pics**
Waist: 27-42" (top of foldover waistband); 27-36" (bottom of foldover waistband)
Front Rise: up to 11" (depending where waistband sits; foldover waistband is 4")
Back Rise: up to 13"
Inseam: 32.5"
Length: up to 41"

**leave a note to seller or convo me if you need it hemmed

Pants were washed after construction, prior to pics and measurements.

All shipments come with tracking.

'Like' my page on facebook for updates and sales!
www.facebook.com/trefoilclothing

******************************************************************************
The use of the scrap fabrics that you see in some of my designs was inspired by Intergalactic Apparel's weaved fabric - check out their amazing clothing on etsy!
www.intergalacticapparel.etsy.com

I'd also like to promote the shop that inspired me to start sewing in the first place - my use of corsets and grommet tape all over the place is inspired by her amazing designs!
www.alterecoclothing.etsy.com (formerly www.blackwidowdiy.etsy.com)
